data.title: False Contact
data.instructions: As you approach the location of the blip, your scanner stops making noise. Must have been a false positive.

data.title: Double Contact
data.instructions:
As you approach the location of the blip, it splits in two.

Draw two monster cards and add both. Ignore the result of any further contact cards.

data.title: Mini Weevil
data.instructions: Priority [1]: Move towards nearest player, and then melee attack the nearest target
